name: Xplore the world
description:
In this game you go to several country's  in the world. For this Demo version we have only prepared Bolivia.

The Assets Used for this project:

City Package-https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/city-package-107224

Basic Motions FREE-https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/basic-motions-free-154271

Distant Lands Free Characters-https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/distant-lands-free-character...

Free Stylized Textures-https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/free-stylized-textur...
